description: This file contains the definition of the AppDatabase class, an abstract RoomDatabase implementation for the notes application. It specifies the entities (Note and Category), provides DAO accessor methods, and includes singleton instantiation logic for database access.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase, defining the database structure for notes and categories, and providing singleton access method.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns a singleton instance of AppDatabase, creating it if necessary, using the application's context.
